mobilize.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to encourage people to support something in an active way
mobilize.translation[0].definitions[0].e: an attempt to mobilize popular opinion
a campaign to mobilize support for the strike
mobilize.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to start to use the things or people you have available in order to achieve something
mobilize.translation[0].definitions[1].e: They failed to mobilize their resources effectively.
mobilize.translation[0].definitions[2].d: if a country mobilizes or mobilizes its army, it prepares to fight a war
mobilize.translation[0].definitions[3].d: to help something to move more easily
